mapper.insert: insert into t_user (id, loginacct, username, password, email, phone_num, gender, login_status, token, create_date, now_date, last_date, blog_num, level, relative_file_path, id_card) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{loginacct,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phoneNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{loginStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{token,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nowDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{blogNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{relativeFilePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update t_user set loginacct = #{loginacct,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone_num = #{phoneNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, login_status = #{loginStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, token = #{token,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now_date = #{nowDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_date = #{lastDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, blog_num = #{blogNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, level = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, relative_file_path = #{relativeFilePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, id_card = #{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, loginacct, username, password, email, phone_num, gender, login_status, token, create_date, now_date, last_date, blog_num, level, relative_file_path, id_card from t_user where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
